      • sendChatMessage

        public void sendChatMessage(java.lang.String s_MSG)
        Sends a chat message to everyone

        To send a Message to a single user type /msg NICKNAME MESSAGE

        example: /msg otto hello otto

        Parameters:
        s_MSG - the Chat message
